text: Jujuy is a province of Argentina. It is in the far northwest of the country, at the borders with Chile and Bolivia. File:Cerro de los siete colores.jpg| File:Pucará de Tilcara 01.JPG| File:Camino a Villa Nougues (Tucumán).jpg| File:Jujuy-Capital-P3110030.JPG| ==References==
title: Jujuy Province
